panels.title:
Consensus Height by Validator
malachitebft_core_consensus_height
panels.description:
Current consensus block height per validator.

**Metric:** `malachitebft_core_consensus_height`
**Type:** Gauge  
**Labels:** moniker, job
**Expected:** Should increment consistently across all validators

panels.title:
Consensus Round
malachitebft_core_consensus_round
panels.description:
Current consensus round number.

**Metric:** `malachitebft_core_consensus_round`
**Type:** Gauge
**Labels:** moniker, job
**Expected:** Usually 0 (successful first round), higher values indicate round changes

panels.title:
Block Production Rate
malachitebft_core_consensus_height (rate)
panels.description:
Rate of block height increase (blocks/second).

**Metric:** `rate(malachitebft_core_consensus_height[$__rate_interval])`
**Type:** Gauge (derived)
**Expected:** ~1 block/sec

panels.title:
Block Size ⚠️ Pending Instrumentation
malachitebft_core_consensus_block_size_bytes_sum
panels.description:
⚠️ **Pending instrumentation in Ultramarine consensus path.**

Currently only emitted in Starknet host. This metric will be populated in a future update.

**Metric:** `malachitebft_core_consensus_block_size_bytes_sum`
**Type:** Histogram (sum)
**Expected:** Block size in bytes

panels.title:
Blob Verification Rate
blob_engine_verifications_total (rate)
panels.description:
Rate of blob KZG proof verifications (successes vs failures).

**Metric:** `rate(blob_engine_verifications_total[$__rate_interval])`
**Type:** Counter
**Labels:** moniker, result (success/failure)
**Expected:** Mostly successes, failures indicate network issues or malicious proposals

panels.title:
Blob Verification Latency (P99/P50)
blob_engine_verification_duration_seconds
panels.description:
KZG proof verification latency percentiles.

**Metric:** `histogram_quantile(0.99, rate(blob_engine_verification_duration_seconds_bucket[$__rate_interval]))`
**Type:** Histogram
**Target:** P99 < 50ms
**Labels:** moniker

panels.title:
Blob Storage Size by State
blob_engine_storage_bytes
panels.description:
Total blob storage size split by lifecycle state.

**Metric:** `blob_engine_storage_bytes`
**Type:** Gauge
**Labels:** moniker, state (undecided/decided)
**Note:** Decided blobs are prunable after archival

panels.title:
Blob Lifecycle Transitions
blob_engine_lifecycle_transitions_total (rate)
panels.description:
Blob state transitions over time.

**Metric:** `rate(blob_engine_lifecycle_transitions_total[$__rate_interval])`
**Type:** Counter
**Labels:** moniker, transition (promoted/dropped/pruned)
**Promoted:** undecided â†’ decided (on consensus finalization)
**Dropped:** Failed rounds or timeouts
**Pruned:** Removed after archival

panels.title:
Blobs Per Block
blob_engine_blobs_per_block
panels.description:
Number of blob sidecars included in each finalized block.

**Metric:** `blob_engine_blobs_per_block`
**Type:** Gauge
**Labels:** moniker
**Expected:** 0-6 for typical Ethereum EIP-4844 blocks, up to 1024 for data-oriented L1

panels.title:
Blob Sync Failures by Reason
blob_engine_sync_failures_total (rate)
panels.description:
Blob sync failure breakdown by error type.

**Metric:** `rate(blob_engine_sync_failures_total[$__rate_interval])`
**Type:** Counter
**Labels:** moniker, reason
**High values indicate:** Network issues, malicious proposals, or storage problems

panels.title:
Transaction Pool Pending Pool Size Bytes
reth_transaction_pool_pending_pool_size_bytes

Blockchain Tree In Mem State Num Blocks
reth_blockchain_tree_in_mem_state_num_blocks

Engine Rpc Forkchoice Updated Messages Not Valid
reth_engine_rpc_forkchoice_updated_messages not valid

Engine Rpc Get Payload V3 Count
reth_engine_rpc_get_payload_v3_count

Engine Rpc New Payload Messages Not Valid
reth_engine_rpc_new_payload_messages not valid

Network Pool Transactions Messages Sent Total
reth_network_pool_transactions_messages_sent_total

Network Pool Transactions Messages Received Total
reth_network_pool_transactions_messages_received_total

options.content:
# Quick PromQL Reference

## Common Queries

**Consensus Height:**
```
malachitebft_core_consensus_height
```

**Consensus Round:**
```
malachitebft_core_consensus_round
```

**Block Production Rate:**
```
rate(malachitebft_core_consensus_height[5m])
```

**Filter by Validator:**
```
malachitebft_core_consensus_height{moniker="test-0"}
```

**Filter by Job:**
```
malachitebft_core_consensus_height{job=~"malachite.*"}
```

## Useful Resources

- [Prometheus Explore →](http://localhost:9090/explore)
- [Prometheus Targets →](http://localhost:9090/targets)
- [PromQL Documentation](https://prometheus.io/docs/prometheus/latest/querying/basics/)

title: Ultramarine Consensus + Execution
description: Monitoring dashboard for Ultramarine (Malachite BFT) consensus and Reth execution layer. [Prometheus Explore →](http://localhost:9090)
